name: Night Defense
description:
A wave defense shooting game, point and click to shoot, fight off enemy hoards. Survive for as long as possible! This is the first game our team has made.
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Controls: (you spawn empty handed! dont forget to equip the revolver!)

1: swap revolver

2:swap shotgun

3:swap uzi

4:swap harpoon gun

Click: shoot

Story:

The Tenebraic army marches across the earth and mankind is certainly defeated. Live out the final moments of Ox Teeth McHandy as he fights off an endless horde! With his trusty duck, Nails, Ox is determined to quell ALL of the undead, and be the last man standing!
